trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Managment How To Table of Contents
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Managment How To Table of Contents

trans-unit.source: Learn how to manage privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Managment extention.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to manage privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Managment extention.

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management
trans-unit.target: Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management

trans-unit.source: Starting the Privileged Identity Management extension
trans-unit.target: Starting the Privileged Identity Management extension

trans-unit.source: Create a directory in Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Create a directory in Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Add users to your Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Add users to your Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Create a few global administrators in your directory.
trans-unit.target: Create a few global administrators in your directory.

trans-unit.source: Log in to <http://portal.azure.com> with a global administrator account.
trans-unit.target: Log in to <http://portal.azure.com> with a global administrator account.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **username** in the upper left hand corner of the portal.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **username** in the upper left hand corner of the portal.

trans-unit.source: Click the **New** icon in the left navigation.
trans-unit.target: Click the **New** icon in the left navigation.

trans-unit.source: Select **Security + Identity** from the Create menu.
trans-unit.target: Select **Security + Identity** from the Create menu.

trans-unit.source: Select **Azure AD Privileged Identity Management** from the **Security + Identity** menu.
trans-unit.target: Select **Azure AD Privileged Identity Management** from the **Security + Identity** menu.

trans-unit.source: Leave the **Pin to Startboard checkbox** checked and then click the **Create** button.
trans-unit.target: Leave the **Pin to Startboard checkbox** checked and then click the **Create** button.

trans-unit.source: The Privileged Identity Management dashboard will open.
trans-unit.target: The Privileged Identity Management dashboard will open.
